Title: Dave
Actors: Kevin Kline, Sigourney Weaver, Frank Langella, Kevin Dunn
Plot: An uncanny Presidential lookalike named Dave is recruited by the Secret Service to become a momentary stand-in for the President of the United States.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 5 nominations.
Production: Donner/Schuler-Donner, Northern Lights Entertainment, Warner Brothers
